database_description.abstract: The COVID-19 Business Pulse Surveys, conducted by the World Bank, assesses the pandemic's impact on businesses worldwide. The surveys measure effects on sales, labor, liquidity, operations, and public policy support, covering firms of all sizes across diverse economic sectors and income levels. Conducted in two waves across 78 countries, the dataset includes responses from over 170,000 businesses.
